fr.escape.game.entity.ships

Interface Ship

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Collisionable, Drawable, Entity, Moveable, Updateable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Boss
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBoss, AbstractShip

    public interface Ship
extends Entity
    The Ship Interface define the needed operation for a Ship which can move and fire Shot.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface fr.escape.game.entity.Collisionable

        BONUS_TYPE, NPC_TYPE, PLAYER_TYPE, SHOT_TYPE, WALL_TYPE

      • getAllWeapons

        java.util.List<Weapon> getAllWeapons()
        Get all the Weapon initialized for a Ship.
        Returns:
        List of Weapon used by a Ship.

      • setActiveWeapon

        void setActiveWeapon(int which)
        Method that set the current activate Weapon.
        Parameters:
        which - : The ID of the Weapon which will be the new active Weapon.

      • getActiveWeapon

        Weapon getActiveWeapon()
        Get the active Weapon
        Returns:
        The Weapon currently used by the Ship.

      • getBodyDef

        BodyDef getBodyDef()
        Get the BodyDef.
        Returns:
        The initial JBox2D BodyDef that set the JBox2D Body of a Ship.

      • getX

        float getX()
        Get body coordinate on X axis.
        Returns:
        The coordinate on X axis in meters.

      • getY

        float getY()
        Get body coordinate on Y axis.
        Returns:
        The coordinate on Y axis in meters.

      • isPlayer

        boolean isPlayer()
        Check if this Ship belong to the Player.
        Returns:
        Return true if the current Ship is the player Ship, false otherwise.

      • isWeaponLoaded

        boolean isWeaponLoaded()
        Check if a Shot is loaded in the active Weapon
        Returns:
        Return true if the active Weapon has loaded her Shot and is ready to fire, flase otherwise.

      • createBody

        void createBody(World world)
        Method that create the Ship Body in the JBox2D World.
        Parameters:
        world - : The World in which the Ship will be add.

      • loadWeapon

        boolean loadWeapon()
        Load a Shot in the activate Weapon.
        Returns:
        Return true if the Weapon is successfully loaded, false otherwise.

      • reloadWeapon

        boolean reloadWeapon(int which,
                   int number)
        Method use to reload ammunitions of a Weapon.
        Parameters:
        which - : The ID of the Weapon concerned by the reload.
        number - : Quantity of ammunitions to add.
        Returns:
        Return true if the reload have been done successfully, false otherwise.

      • fireWeapon

        boolean fireWeapon()
        Method to fire a Shot previously loaded.
        Returns:
        Return true if the Weapon has successfully fired, false otherwise.

      • fireWeapon

        boolean fireWeapon(float[] velocity)
        Method to fire a Shot previously loaded.
        Parameters:
        velocity - : Array which contains the linear velocity parameters to launch a Shot.
        Returns:
        Return true if the Weapon has successfully fired, false otherwise.

      • getEdge

        java.awt.Rectangle getEdge()
        Get the Body edge.
        Returns:
        A Rectangle in which the JBox2D Body is contained.

      • reset

        boolean reset(float x,
            float y)
        Reset a Ship at is initial state (position, Weapon, life).
        Parameters:
        x - : Position in meters on X axis.
        y - : Position in meters on Y axis.
        Returns:
        Return true if the Ship was successfully reset, false otherwise.

      • damage

        Method use to reduce the life after taking damage.
